item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:

7. Bus stops here: Shanghai lets riders design their own routes (212 points | 156 comments)
8. Branch Privilege Injection: Exploiting branch predictor race conditions (374 points | 158 comments)
9. Replicube: A puzzle game about writing code to create shapes (58 points | 15 comments)
10. Google is building its own DeX: First look at Android's Desktop Mode (324 points | 247 comments)
11. Mipmap selection in too much detail (53 points | 13 comments)
12. Show HN: HelixDB – Open-source vector-graph database for AI applications (Rust) (167 points | 74 comments)

14. Failed Soviet Venus lander Kosmos 482 crashes to Earth after 53 years in orbit (145 points | 100 comments)
15. Build real-time knowledge graph for documents with LLM (132 points | 23 comments)
16. EM-LLM: Human-Inspired Episodic Memory for Infinite Context LLMs (59 points | 7 comments)
17. PDF to Text, a challenging problem (289 points | 159 comments)
18. Multiple security issues in GNU Screen (376 points | 227 comments)
19. Vircadia, a Bun and PostgreSQL-powered reactivity layer for games (4 points | 1 comment)
20. Airbnb is in midlife crisis mode (155 points | 282 comments)
21. Fingers wrinkle the same way every time they’re in the water too long (129 points | 53 comments)
22. It Awaits Your Experiments (166 points | 58 comments)
23. Using obscure graph theory to solve programming languages problems (64 points | 12 comments)
24. The world could run on older hardware if software optimization was a priority (695 points | 631 comments)
25. Garbage collection of object storage at scale (76 points | 9 comments)
26. The recently lost file upload feature in the Nextcloud app for Android (22 points | 4 comments)
27. A tool to verify estimates, II: a flexible proof assistant (48 points | discuss)
28. OpenTelemetry protocol with Apache Arrow (92 points | 16 comments)
29. I learned Snobol and then wrote a toy Forth (130 points | 35 comments)
30. The great displacement is already well underway? (359 points | 360 comments)
